parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. While the post advocates for change and criticizes established parties, it does not explicitly mention or refer to any specific parliamentary candidate by name or clearly identifiable attribute.  The hashtags used are general and do not single out a specific candidate.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The language used ("E timpul pentru schimbare!", "România are nevoie de oameni noi", etc.) and the call to action ("Ieși la vot") are clearly aimed at a broad segment of the population.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>Partially True. The post's objective is to encourage voting for change and against established parties. While it doesn't explicitly endorse a specific candidate, the implicit call to vote for "oameni noi" could be interpreted as promoting the candidacy of individuals associated with the PNCR (Partidul Național Conservator Român), given the advertiser's affiliation.  However, this is indirect and not a direct call to vote for a specific person. The overall message focuses on broader political themes rather than a specific candidate's platform.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>Partially True. The post presents opinions and criticisms of existing political parties. While it's not strictly journalistic in style, it touches upon political issues and could be considered a form of citizen journalism or political commentary. However, the clear call to action and the overall tone suggest a persuasive intent beyond mere information dissemination.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. While the post expresses opinions, it's not a purely personal opinion piece. The structured message, the use of hashtags, and the paid advertisement format indicate an intention to influence public opinion and voting behavior, going beyond a simple expression of personal views.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1087530292633922</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post walks a fine line. It doesn't directly endorse a specific candidate, but its call for "oameni noi" in parliament, coupled with the advertiser's affiliation with the PNCR, creates an indirect endorsement. The timing of the post (during the electoral period) and its paid advertisement format strongly suggest an intention to influence voters.  While it doesn't explicitly violate Article 36 (7) - a (direct reference to a candidate), the indirect nature of the endorsement and the clear electoral objective (encouraging voting for change) raise concerns about compliance with Article 98 t).  The "in dubio pro reo" principle should be applied cautiously here, as the intent to influence the vote is evident.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>PNCR</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNCR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Pop Sebastian Tiberiu, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul 1087530292633922, care, deși nu menționează explicit un candidat, îndeamnă la vot pentru „oameni noi” în parlament, având în vedere afilierea advertiserului la PNCR, creează un efect electoral pozitiv pentru acest partid.  Mesajul „Ieși la vot și trimite în parlament oameni care să se lupte pentru adevăr și dreptate!”, combinat cu criticile la adresa partidelor mari, constituie o formă indirectă, dar evidentă, de propagandă electorală, vizând influențarea votului în favoarea PNCR.  Această acțiune, chiar dacă nu este o încălcare directă a articolului 36 (7) - a, este o încălcare a spiritului legii și a articolului 98 t), având în vedere contextul electoral și intenția clară de a influența votul.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
